Body: Description: Port 587 is set to HTTP instead of SMTP by default. According to documentation it should be set to SMTP. Was wondering why that is the configuration by default.
Robert advised we should open a ticket with r&d to check this and solve it.
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Go in the UI to Content Aware Protection - Deep Packet Inspection - Predefined Ports

What We've Learned Updated: - Asked for clarifications from the customer regarding his query
- checked on our side if indeed it is a bug
- raise a case to R&D to correct the issue

Next Steps Updated: - check with engineering if this is a bug
- waiting for R&D to finish their investigation
